ProjectTitle: Lassa virus: unravelling the within-host evolutionary dynamics of acute and persistent infections and the virulence evolution among hosts

2. Data: please also list your samples here, those are physical data
3. Ethics: you now give your CMT number, please list your ethical approval number(s) starting with S for UZL ethics, G for SMEC or P of ECD and briefly indicate which experiments are approved. 
4. Metadata: which metadata will you collect and how, are you generating this with your measurements? 
7. Sharing: do you already know which data repository you might use? Would any of the EBI repositories (www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) be suitable? ENA gives good checklists for reporting, please take a look if any of these may be a useful metadata standard for your work: www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/checklists. For data for which there is no disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr).
